game.name: Dwarfer
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 이 도전적인 2 차원 퍼즐 게임에서 금을 찾아 위험한 동굴을 통해 두 드워프를 안내합니다. 모든 움직임은 두 드워프에게 영향을 미치며 생존을 보장하기 위해 전략적 사고가 필요합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Guide two dwarves through dangerous caves in search of gold in this challenging 2D puzzle game. Every move affects both dwarves, requiring strategic thinking to ensure their survival.

reviewHighlights.text: Gnomes and caves, thorns and nerves. It hurts them and hurts us, buy a kilogram! Move your fingers forward, but it doesn’t work back, the tree grows,...
the game is very interesting, I liked the idea of the game, there are puzzles where you need to think, the game is fascinating, has easy controls and...
